caption.p: List of HEV genomic promoter, sub-genomic promoter, and RdRp interacting host proteins.

tr.td: HNRNPU, HNRNPA2B1, HNRNPF, NCL, CKAP4, HNRNPK, DDX3X, ACTA2, and POTEF
